author: Original author: Hina Ota
cardtext1: With the use of advanced AI, your PowerPoint presentations are generatedwith ease. Simply provide your desired content, and our application will handle the structuring and summarization for each slide. Say goodbye to the stress of manually creating slide content and be confident that your message is being communicated effectively.
cardtext2: Everything you need to generate a PowerPoint presentation is readily available. With a user-friendly interface, you can input your content, select your template, and generate your presentation all in one place. The application reduces routine work, allowing you to focus on the creative aspects of your presentation.
cardtext3: Our PowerPoint generator takes the complexity out of creating a well-structured presentation. It handles the challenging task of organizing your information into clear, concise, and engaging slides. It accepts from long content like the docmentation of your work to short description of your idea. No need to worry about information overload or slide formatting.
presentation: What is the title for the presentation?
howManySlidesDoYouNeed: How many slides do you need?
insertImageAutomatically: Insert image automatically (this might insert irrelevant information)
manageProfile: Here you can manage your profile.
